mdRecord.dcterms:title: Born Yesterday
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the 1978 plays: Born Yesterday by Garson Kanin. Directed by John Olon-Scrymgeour. Scenic Design by Parmelee Welles. Costumes by Sigrid Insull. Lighting by Sara Ross Morgan. June 6, 1978 | Corn is Green by Emlyn Williams. Directed by Rex Partington. Scenic Design by Parmelee Welles. Costumes by Sigrid Insull. Lighting by Sara Ross Morgan. June 13, 1978 | Tartuffe by Moli√©re. Directed by Ada Brown Mather. Scenic Design by Parmelee Williams. Costumes by Sigrid Insull. Lighting by Sara Ross Morgan. June 20, 1978.
